Text: Research Group Cc Kim With the support and cooperation of Vince Kaminski and his group I have been putting together a written piece about the Research Group within Enron The focus is on group members experiences and learning from working in its strongly collegial creative work environment I want to include in the writing the clients perspective regarding the value and effectiveness of the groups services Vince and Krishna suggested your name I respect confidentiality in this work As with the others you will have given approval to anything I use from your interview Would you be willing to talk very briefly by phone with me this week If so please suggest a time when I could call Thank you Ann Thomas

Research Group Cc Mark With the support and cooperation of Vince Kaminski and his group I have been putting together a written piece about the Research Group within Enron The focus is on group members experiences and learning from working in its strongly collegial creative work environment I want to include in the writing the clients perspective regarding the value and effectiveness of the groups services Vince and Zimin suggested your name I respect confidentiality in this work As with the others you will have given approval to anything I use from the interview Would you be willing to talk very briefly by phone with me this week If so please suggest a time when I could call and a phone number Thank you Ann Thomas

Research Group Cc Ed With the support and cooperation of Vince Kaminski and his group I have been putting together a written piece about the Research Group within Enron The focus is on group members experiences and learning from working in its strongly collegial creative work environment I want to include in the writing the clients perspective regarding the value and effectiveness of the groups services Vince and Zimin Lu suggested your name I respect confidentiality in this work As with the others you will have given approval to anything I use from your interview Would you be willing to talk very briefly by phone with me this week If so please suggest a time when I could call and a phone number Thank you Ann Thomas

Follow Up on Research Storypst Vince Ive ended up interviewing people in the Research Group everyone was very cooperative and insightful Now I am in the process of synthesizing the information into coherence I think itll be a great story with even more substance and depth than I had initially envisioned When we talked a few weeks ago you offered to give me one or two names of people with whom I could talk with to get the perspective on the internal and perhaps external business value of the Research Group from someone outside of the Research Group I assume that would be someone within Enron Could you send me the names and contact information for this The conversations would be relatively brief and either in person or by phone Thanks again for your interest and support Ill keep you informed of progress Ann Thomas

Research Group TeamworkVince Over the past year and a half I have been continually impressed with the richly diverse and highly collaborative working environment you created among members of the Research Group As you know I pay attention to people issues in my work and seldom have I observed such a successful and diverse team environment I believe that this experience is worth sharing with others and would like to write about it The purpose of the project would be to capture and share learnings related to the dynamics of the Research Group larger Enron issues would not be included The writing would be based on interviews with you and perhaps ten others in the department Anything I write would be approved by those who are quoted and the complete article would be reviewed and approved by you before being shared outside I do not expect to receive any financial support for the effort I have some time now and enjoy doing the kind of effort Im proposing I can show you a sample of similar previouslypublished works Ive done I realize that these days are already confusing and draining for you all On the other hand this is a good time perhaps the only time to capture the wisdom that each of you has gained from this team experience If you have interest in my pursuing this idea would you be available to talk with me further in the next couple of days Respectfully Ann Thomas Bob Lees wife
